greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of nonnegative integer matrices with total sum n, distinct columns with equal sums and any number of distinct nonzero rows in decreasing lexicographic order.
comment: The condition that the rows be in decreasing order is equivalent to considering nonequivalent matrices with distinct rows up to permutation of rows.
results.author: _Andrew Howroyd_, Jan 13 2020
